Callbacks∵

Callbacks are a means of registering to receive payloads of information to a specific URL of your choice. You may create multiple callbacks. Events will be sent to each callback URL. In the event that a 20x response is not received when the payload is sent to the callback URL, the callback will be retried up to 10 times with an initial retry delay of 10 minutes which will increase exponentially with each failure for the next 7 days.


Available Query Filters
created_at

Available Operations: =, !=, <, <=, >, >=

Default Operation: =

Sortable: True

note
Callbacks can be added through the Dashboard via the Webhooks area on the marketplace Settings page.

Create a Callback∵

Create a Callback to which events will be sent.

url
required string. The url the callbacks will be made to
method
optional string. HTTP method used for the callback, one of post, put or get

Definition

POST https://api.balancedpayments.com/callbacks

Balanced::Callback.new

balanced.Callback()

balanced.marketplace.callbacks.create()

Callback(Map<String, Object> payload)

\Balanced\Callback()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/callbacks \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -d "url=http://www.example.com/callback" \
     -d "method=post"

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

callback = Balanced::Callback.new(
  :method => 'post',
  :url => 'http://www.example.com/callback'
).save

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

callback = balanced.Callback(
  url='http://www.example.com/callback',
  method='post'
).save()

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.marketplace.callbacks.create({
    "url": "http://www.example.com/callback", 
    "method": "post"
})

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

HashMap<String, Object> payload = new HashMap<String, Object>();
payload.put("url", "http://www.example.com/callback");
payload.put("method", "");

Callback callback = new Callback(payload);

try {
    callback.save();
}
catch (HTTPError e) {}

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$callback = new Balanced\Callback(array(
  "url" => "http://www.example.com/callback"
));
$callback->save();

?>

Example Response

{
    "callbacks": [
        {
            "href": "/callbacks/CB4mGj6AJ3D9JWQjclsEkc4i", 
            "id": "CB4mGj6AJ3D9JWQjclsEkc4i", 
            "links": {}, 
            "method": "post", 
            "revision": "1.1", 
            "url": "http://www.example.com/callback"
        }
    ], 
    "links": {}
}

Fetch a Callback∵

Definition

GET https://api.balancedpayments.com/callbacks/:callback_id

Balanced::Callback.fetch

balanced.Callback.fetch()

balanced.get()

Callback(String uri)

Balanced\Callback::get

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/callbacks/CB4mGj6AJ3D9JWQjclsEkc4i \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL:

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

callback = Balanced::Callback.fetch('/callbacks/CB6X0CIZ60usYCaBAazlT8VG')

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

callback = balanced.Callback.fetch('/callbacks/CB5pnz4XnaDpRFGlNMb6u50R')

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/callbacks/CB4mGj6AJ3D9JWQjclsEkc4i')

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Callback callback = new Callback("/callbacks/CB40OMtABWHqkGcBEYpWVnAd");

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$callback = \Balanced\Callback::get("/callbacks/CB2UgKCxIYwn8tV5kSS7LRAS");

?>

Example Response

{
    "callbacks": [
        {
            "href": "/callbacks/CB4mGj6AJ3D9JWQjclsEkc4i", 
            "id": "CB4mGj6AJ3D9JWQjclsEkc4i", 
            "links": {}, 
            "method": "post", 
            "revision": "1.1", 
            "url": "http://www.example.com/callback"
        }
    ], 
    "links": {}
}

List all Callbacks∵

limit
optional integer. Defaults to 10.
offset
optional integer. Defaults to 0.

Definition

GET https://api.balancedpayments.com/callbacks

Balanced::Callback.all

balanced.Callback.query

balanced.marketplace.callbacks

Callback.Collection(String uri)

Balanced\Marketplace::mine()->callbacks->query()->all()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/callbacks \
      -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
      -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL:

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

callbacks = Balanced::Callback.all

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

callbacks = balanced.Callback.query

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.marketplace.callbacks

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Callback.Collection callbacks = new Callback.Collection(Callback.resource_href);

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$marketplace = Balanced\Marketplace::mine();
$callbacks = $marketplace->callbacks->query()->all();

?>

Example Response

{
    "callbacks": [
        {
            "href": "/callbacks/CB4mGj6AJ3D9JWQjclsEkc4i", 
            "id": "CB4mGj6AJ3D9JWQjclsEkc4i", 
            "links": {}, 
            "method": "post", 
            "revision": "1.1", 
            "url": "http://www.example.com/callback"
        }
    ], 
    "links": {}, 
    "meta": {
        "first": "/callbacks?limit=10&offset=0", 
        "href": "/callbacks?limit=10&offset=0", 
        "last": "/callbacks?limit=10&offset=0", 
        "limit": 10, 
        "next": null, 
        "offset": 0, 
        "previous": null, 
        "total": 1
    }
}

Delete a Callback∵

Definition

DELETE https://api.balancedpayments.com/callbacks/:callback_id

Balanced::Callback.unstore

balanced.Callback().unstore()

balanced.get().unstore()

Callback().delete()

Balanced\Callback->unstore()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/callbacks/CB4mGj6AJ3D9JWQjclsEkc4i \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -X DELETE

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

callback = Balanced::Callback.fetch('/callbacks/CB6X0CIZ60usYCaBAazlT8VG')
callback.unstore

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

callback = balanced.Callback.fetch('/callbacks/CB5pnz4XnaDpRFGlNMb6u50R')
callback.unstore()

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/callbacks/CB4mGj6AJ3D9JWQjclsEkc4i').unstore()

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Callback callback = new Callback("/callbacks/CB40OMtABWHqkGcBEYpWVnAd");

try {
    callback.delete();
}
catch (APIError e) {}
catch (NotCreated e) {}

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$callback = \Balanced\Callback::get("/callbacks/CB2UgKCxIYwn8tV5kSS7LRAS");
$callback->unstore();

?>
